name: ZoomCar, Inc.
description: ZoomCar, Inc. is a leading car rental and mobility solutions provider focused on transforming the way people access transportation. Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Bangalore, India, ZoomCar offers a unique self-drive car rental service that allows customers to rent vehicles for short or long durations. The company aims to make car rentals accessible, affordable, and convenient, catering to the growing demand for on-demand mobility solutions. With a diverse fleet that includes economy, premium, and electric vehicles, ZoomCar provides customers with a variety of choices to suit their travel needs. The company has also introduced innovative features such as keyless entry and a mobile app that enables seamless booking and vehicle access. ZoomCar is committed to promoting sustainable transportation solutions by incorporating electric vehicles into its fleet and encouraging eco-friendly travel options. In addition to car rentals, ZoomCar is expanding its services to include subscription models and corporate rentals, aiming to cater to both individual and business customers. As cities around the world continue to evolve and urban mobility challenges grow, ZoomCar is well-positioned to lead the charge towards smarter, more efficient transportation solutions.

seo.meta_title: ZoomCar, Inc. | Self-Drive Car Rentals and Mobility Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover ZoomCar, Inc., a leader in self-drive car rentals and innovative mobility solutions. Explore our diverse fleet and commitment to sustainable transportation.

faq.question: What services does ZoomCar offer?
faq.answer: ZoomCar offers self-drive car rentals, corporate rentals, and subscription services.

faq.question: Where is ZoomCar headquartered?
faq.answer: ZoomCar is headquartered in Bangalore, India.

faq.question: What types of vehicles are available for rent?
faq.answer: ZoomCar offers a variety of vehicles, including economy cars, premium cars, and electric vehicles.
